divs: Sighting Detailsit was a giant green light on the ground,but the light was pointing up into the sky.it was off in the distance,but we could see in clearly.it looked like it was giving out green cloud.it was round, yet oval.It sort-of looked like a cone at a time. It was very bright.it left right when we stopped looking for a minute. we where quite scared at the time but we knew what we where doing.once again i would like to state that we do have footage and many pictures of the sighting.At one time a pink light came just the same,but closer to us,then it left in a quick minute.at the time we were just watching TV in our room and it appeard. it was so bright it caught our attention very quickly.we knew right away it was a UFO.
Object Shape: Circle, Egg, Fireball, Oval, Saturn-like, Other
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Surrey
There were no other sightings in Surrey on or around January 18th 2007
Summary: it was a huge green light in the on the ground and it kept on moveing and we have actull footage and pictures of the event
